thread.section_title: Bench Africa Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bench Africa | www.benchafrica.com
thread.title: Natalie Beith
thread.title_full: Bench Africa reviewed by Natalie Beith

author: Natalie Beith
title: Natalie Beith
text: I cannot fault Bench International. They were not only helpful and very knowledgeable but not a thing went wrong! Everything went to plan and we were totally impressed by their professionalism and friendliness. They seemed to genuinely care about what we wanted and went out of their way to make our trip our most memorable. Their knowledge of Africa was second to none and I'm so glad we did everything they suggested as it was perfect. Do yourself a favour and contact Bench. Julie was amazing...
